Posts.Content: Thank you - I seem to have a constant sinus problem which apparently can happen and just seen the response below which makes sense - about the blood cells.  Got through second chemo and symptoms all identical again and have reached day and on day 12 which is when I start to feel ok again! Thank you so much xx
Posts.Title: EC chemo - back pain

Posts.Content: Hi Terry Wow thanks that would make sense! Yes I’m doing the injections and it happened again on second session - more like sort of muscle aches and spasm up my back - only lasts 2 days.  Thank you so much - how are you doing? Xxx
Posts.Title: EC chemo - back pain

Posts.Content: Hi I have had one session of EC chemo and have been very tired but on day 9 I have woken up with back pain from the very base of my spine - shooting up my back to my neck and head.  Has anyone else experienced this please? Thank you
Posts.Title: EC chemo - back pain
